
```bash
cassandra@cqlsh:store> ALTER KEYSPACE system_auth WITH REPLICATION= {'class' : 'SimpleStrategy','replication_factor' : 3 };

Warnings :
When increasing replication factor you need to run a full (-full) repair to distribute the data.
```
